general.title: Portfolio Website (Netlify + Cloudflare)
general.description: This site: static frontend on Netlify with Cloudflare in front (DNS/TLS/WAF/caching). Includes a Netlify Function that queries Cloudflare GraphQL Analytics to display live stats.

general.title: Custom PC Build
general.description: Planned and assembled a high‑performance workstation. Optimized UEFI, enabled Secure Boot/TPM, tuned airflow and cable management, and validated thermals/stability.

security.title: Blue Team: SIEM + WAF Detections
security.description: Created Sigma‑style SIEM rules and Cloudflare WAF rules to detect and mitigate common web attacks; tested alerts with synthetic events.

security.title: Red Team: Recon & Phishing Lab
security.description: Built a small lab to practice OSINT recon, payload delivery, and detection evasion against blue‑team rules (for educational purposes only).
